comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: It seems odd that there would be an ANZAC day procession only a year after the landing, and only a few months after the evacuation

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Hi Ian Thanks for you comment. ANZAC Day processions or marches were held in many places in Australia in 1916. For more about this check out the Australian War Memorial's ANZAC Day Tradition webpage.
